titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that the President or the Congress should abrogate the Panama Canal Treaties of 1977 and the Neutrality Treaty and the Congress should repeal the Panama Act of 1979.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Western Hemisphere Affairs.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Navigation.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from DOD, State, Panama Canal Commission.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. States that: (1) the President or the Congress should immediately abrogate the Panama Canal Treaties of 1977 and the Treaty Concerning the Permanent Neutrality and Operation of the Panama Canal; and (2) the Congress should repeal the Panama Canal Act of 1979.
